cpl.readme:
\whitespace trim Enables Relink to relink field names associated with renamed tiddlers. The following fields cannot be interacted with in this way: <<< <$set name=blacklisted filter={{$:/config/flibbles/relink-fieldnames/blacklist!!filter}}> ''<$list counter=counter filter="[enlistsort[]]"> <>
'' <<< See the tw5-relink website for more details and examples.
cpl.title: $:/plugins/flibbles/relink-fieldnames
cpl.author: Flibbles
cpl.name: Relink Field Names
cpl.description: Renames field names with titles matching Relinked tiddlers
title: Plugin_202403265814236
